amendment.description: At the end of the bill add the following new section: TITLE __ SEC. __. The amount otherwise provided for under Title IV for the Federal Payment for Resident Tuition Support is increased by $1,000,000 and the amount otherwise provided for Salaries and Expenses of the Office of Special Counsel is reduced by $1,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to decrease funding (by transfer) regarding the Salaries and Expenses of the Office of Special Counsel by $1 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis, Tom amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 146 - 279 (Roll no. 587).

action.text: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Davis, Tom.
